sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useRef } from "react"; import "../../styles/tour-details.css"; import { Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup } from "reactstrap"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import tourData from "../../assets/data/tours"; import calculateAvgRating from "../../utils/avgRating"; import avatar from "../../assets/images/avatar.jpg"; const TourDetails = () => { const { id } = useParams(); const reviewMsgRef = useRef(""); const [tourRating, setTourRating] = useState(null); //this is an static data later we will call our API and load our data from DB const tour = tourData.find((tours) => tours.id === id); const { photo, title, desc, price, address, reviews, city, distance, maxGroupSize, } = tour; const { totalRating, avgRating } = calculateAvgRating(reviews); const options = { day: "numeric", month: "long", year: "numeric" }; return ( <>

{title}

{calculateAvgRating === 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating === 0 ? ( "Not rated" ) : ( ({reviews?.length}) )}
{address} Rs. {price} / person {distance} km {maxGroupSize} people
Description

{desc}

{/* ============= tour reviews section start ============*/}

Reviews ({reviews?.length} reviews)

setTourRating(1)}>
{reviews?.map((review) => (
muhib

{new Date("01-18-2023").toLocaleDateString( "en-US", options )}

5
Amazing tour
))}
{/* ============= tour reviews section end ============*/}
); }; export default TourDetails;
